text: <Ranulf> bisceop greteð wel alle his þeines & drenges of Ealondscire & of Norhamscire.
Wite ge, þæt icc habbe getyðed Sancte Cuhtberht þæt lond in Elredene & all þæt þær tobelimpeð clæne & clacles.
And Haliwarestelle ic habbe getyðed Sancte Cuhtberht his agen into his cyrce.
And hua sua braues ðisses, braue Crist hine þisses liues hele & heofne rices mirde.
